statements.statement: SELECT COMM_TYPE , COMM_CD , COMM_DESC , COMM_SEQ , USE_YN , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), REGIST_DATE, 121) AS REGIST_DATE , REGIST_USER_ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), MODIFY_DATE, 121) AS MODIFY_DATE , MODIFY_USER_ID , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM MA_COMMON_CODE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMM_TYPE LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #COMM_TYPE# = '' THEN COMM_TYPE ELSE #COMM_TYPE# END) + '%' AND COMM_CD LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #COMM_CD# = '' THEN COMM_CD ELSE #COMM_CD# END) + '%' AND COMM_DESC LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #COMM_DESC# = '' THEN COMM_DESC ELSE #COMM_DESC# END) + '%' ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
SELECT COMM_TYPE , COMM_CD , COMM_DESC , COMM_SEQ , USE_YN FROM MA_COMMON_CODE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMM_TYPE = #COMM_TYPE# AND COMM_CD = #COMM_CD#
SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_DESC FROM MA_COMMON_CODE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMM_TYPE = #COMM_TYPE# AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY COMM_SEQ
SELECT COMM_TYPE FROM MA_COMMON_CODE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY COMM_TYPE ORDER BY COMM_TYPE
SELECT COUNT(COMM_CD) AS VAL_CHK FROM MA_COMMON_CODE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMM_TYPE = #COMM_TYPE# AND COMM_CD = #COMM_CD#

MERGE INTO MA_COMMON_CODE AS A USING (SELECT #COMM_TYPE#, #COMM_CD#) AS B (COMM_TYPE, COMM_CD) ON (A.COMM_TYPE = B.COMM_TYPE AND A.COMM_CD = B.COMM_CD) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.COMM_DESC = #COMM_DESC# , A.COMM_SEQ = #COMM_SEQ# , A.USE_YN = #USE_YN# , A.MODIFY_DATE = GETDATE() , A.MODIFY_USER_ID = #REG_ID# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( COMM_TYPE, COMM_CD, COMM_DESC, COMM_SEQ, USE_YN, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_USER_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #COMM_TYPE#, #COMM_CD#, #COMM_DESC#, #COMM_SEQ#, #USE_YN#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID# );
DELETE FROM MA_COMMON_CODE WHERE COMM_TYPE = #COMM_TYPE# AND COMM_CD = #COMM_CD#
